title: Looking for the following T206 super hall of fame players in any condition
author: curch

posts.post_title: Looking for the following T206 super hall of fame players in any condition
posts.post_content:
I am looking for some of the biggest legends in baseball from the t206 set.  I know this set has a lot of legends but these are the ones that I am interested in.  Condition does not  matter.  The worse the better.  Just looking to have the card of the following players.  I know some of them have a couple and would be interested in any of the variations.  Backs do not matter.

Ty Cobb (Bat on shoulder)
Ty Cobb (Bat off shoulder)
Ty Cobb (Green portrait)

Walter Johnson (hands at chest)

Christy Mathewson (white cap)

Cy Young (portrait)
Cy Young (glove)
Cy Young (bare hand)

Just a little advice,

You might find that some trimmed cards present beautifully and are almost as cheap as complete beaters.

I'll check my collection to see if I have dupes.

Regards,
Scott

I have a T206 Mathewson (white cap) for $180 + $2 (for shipping). It's Graded SGC A with solid eye appeal. It has a slight crease towards the bottom and is slightly trimmed (bottom border). 

Lovely Day...

As mentioned above, AUT cards can be great buys. Our next [URL="http://www.b-lauctions.com"]www.b-lauctions.com[/URL] auction will have a gorgeous Cobb Bat Off, no creases or wrinkles,  but a slight trim....as well as 6 or more other HOF'ers in the same condition. The auction starts in about 3 1/2 weeks. regards
